tools.name: tnos_formula_executor
tools.description: Executes TNOS formulas using the Formula Registry

function.name: executeFormula
function.description: Executes a formula from the TNOS Formula Registry with the given parameters

formulaName.description: Name of the formula to execute

tools.name: tnos_context_query
tools.description: Queries the TNOS 7D context system for dimensional context information

function.name: queryDimensionalContext
function.description: Retrieves context information from a specific dimension in the 7D context framework

dimension.description: The dimension to query in the 7D context system

query.description: The query string to search for in the given dimension

recursiveDepth.description: How deep to recursively search the context hierarchy

tools.name: tnos_mcp_bridge
tools.description: Sends messages directly to the TNOS MCP system

function.name: sendTnosMcpMessage
function.description: Sends a message to a specific layer in the TNOS MCP system

targetLayer.description: The TNOS layer to send the message to (0-6)

messageType.description: Type of MCP message to send

payload.description: The data payload to send to the TNOS MCP system

tools.name: mobius_compression
tools.description: Performs Möbius compression on data using the TNOS compression framework

function.name: performMobiusCompression
function.description: Compresses data using the Möbius compression algorithm with time and energy factors

inputData.description: The data to compress (string or base64 encoded)

useTimeFactor.description: Whether to use the temporal decay factor

useEnergyFactor.description: Whether to use the energy optimization factor

tools.name: tnos_dimensional_context_sync
tools.description: Synchronizes context between GitHub MCP and TNOS 7D dimensional context systems

function.name: synchronizeContext
function.description: Maps and merges context between the two systems

mcpContext.description: Context from GitHub MCP to synchronize with TNOS 7D context
